entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 9.
